panels.title: App 当前 Network 状态

targets.expr: - (sum(irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{namespace=~"$project"}[5m])* on (namespace,pod) group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{namespace=~"$project", workload=~"$appname", workload_type="$type"}) by (workload))

(sum(irate(container_network_receive_packets_dropped_total{namespace=~"$project"}[5m])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{ namespace=~"$project", workload=~"$appname", workload_type="$type"}) by (workload))

-(sum(irate(container_network_transmit_packets_dropped_total{namespace=~"$project"}[5m])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{ namespace=~"$project", workload=~"$appname", workload_type="$type"}) by (workload))

sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate{namespace=~"$project"}* on (namespace,pod)group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{namespace=~"$project", workload=~"$appname", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{namespace=~"$project"}* on (namespace,pod)group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{namespace=~"$project", workload=~"$appname", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod)

sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate{namespace=~"$project"}* on (namespace,pod)group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{namespace=~"$project", workload=~"$appname", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{namespace=~"$project"}* on (namespace,pod)group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{namespace=~"$project", workload=~"$appname", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$project",container!=""}* on (namespace,pod)group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{namespace=~"$project", workload=~"$appname", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{namespace="$project"}* on (namespace,pod)group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{namespace=~"$project", workload=~"$appname", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod)

sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace="$project",container!=""}* on (namespace,pod)group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{namespace=~"$project", workload=~"$appname", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod) / sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{namespace="$project"}* on (namespace,pod)group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{namespace=~"$project", workload=~"$appname", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod)

sum (rate (container_network_receive_bytes_total{pod_name!="",namespace=~"$project.*"}[5m])* on (namespace,pod)group_left(workload,workload_type) mixin_pod_workload{namespace=~"$project", workload=~"$appname", workload_type="$type"}) by (pod)
